text: @piersmorgan @RishiSunak Impressed by @RishiSunak defending role of scientific advice 'scientists advise, ministers decide says decisions during Covid19 crisis made by the PM & ministers and they should be held to account. I'm sure CMO, CSA & SAGE members relieved to hear that. This is incredible! #marr
